title: Screens and screams
abstract: Develop and implement a dynamic, digital workshop program and resulting exhibition for young people in Melbourne.
description: Kids' Own Publishing Partnership will have a series of workshops and resultant exhibition which aims : to promote reading including visual literacy, to engage children in the creative process of working together towards a shared outcome, to produce a number of digital stories, to stimulate publishing in schools beyond the boundaries of the project, to extend children's experience as readers and writers and illustrators.
